Title: P-3 BOMB BAY
description: Roll 2D per shell hit on Bomb Bay

2.description: Drop bombs manually, Bomb Run on Table O-6 is -3

3.description: If bombs already dropped—no effect. Otherwise roll 1D: 1-4 = no effect; 5,6 = bombs detonate—B-17 destroyed and entire crew KIA

sub_roll.5-6: Bombs detonate—B-17 destroyed and entire crew KIA

4.description: If plane lands in water, roll on Table G-10 is -2

5.description: Roll 1D: 1,2 = inoperable—no bomb drop; 3-6 = superficial damage—no effect

sub_roll.1-2: Bomb bay doors inoperable—no bomb drop

12.description: See effect for roll of 12 on Pilot Compartment Table P-2

notes: Bomb results (3, 9, 11) only apply if bombs are still aboard the aircraft
